named-query.name: NodeHostnameEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeHostnameInfo a ORDER BY a.id.facilityId, a.id.hostname

named-query.name: NodeEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeInfo a

named-query.name: NodeEntity.findAllCount
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(a) FROM NodeInfo a

named-query.name: ScopeEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ScopeInfo a

named-query.name: FacilityEntity.findByFacilityType
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FacilityInfo a WHERE a.facilityType = :facilityType ORDER BY a.facilityId

named-query.name: FacilityEntity.findByIpAddressV4
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeInfo a WHERE a.ipAddressV4 = :ipAddressV4 ORDER BY a.facilityId

named-query.name: FacilityEntity.findByIpAddressV6
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeInfo a WHERE LOWER(a.ipAddressV6) = LOWER(:ipAddressV6) ORDER BY a.facilityId

named-query.name: FacilityEntity.findByNodename
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeInfo a WHERE LOWER(a.nodeName) = :nodeName ORDER BY a.facilityId

named-query.name: FacilityEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FacilityInfo a ORDER BY a.facilityId

named-query.name: FacilityEntity.findAllCount
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(a) FROM FacilityInfo a

named-query.name: FacilityEntity.findRootByFacilityType
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FacilityInfo a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT b FROM FacilityRelationEntity b WHERE b.childFacilityId = a.facilityId) AND a.facilityType = :facilityType ORDER BY a.facilityId

named-query.name: FacilityEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FacilityInfo a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.facilityId

named-query.name: NodeCpuInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeCpuInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.deviceName

named-query.name: NodeGeneralDeviceInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeGeneralDeviceInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.deviceName

named-query.name: NodeDiskInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeDiskInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.deviceName

named-query.name: NodeFilesystemInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeFilesystemInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.deviceName

named-query.name: NodeVariableInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeVariableInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.nodeVariableName

named-query.name: NodeHostnameInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeHostnameInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.hostname

named-query.name: NodeMemoryInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeMemoryInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.deviceName

named-query.name: NodeNetworkInterfaceInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeNetworkInterfaceInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.deviceName

named-native-query.name: NodeNetworkInterfaceInfo.findByMacAddress
named-native-query.query: SELECT b.facility_id, b.device_index, b.device_type, b.device_name, b.device_display_name, b.device_size, b.device_size_unit, b.device_description, b.device_nic_ip_address, b.device_nic_mac_address, b.reg_date, b.reg_user, b.update_date, b.update_user FROM ( SELECT a.facility_id, a.device_index, a.device_type, a.device_name, a.device_display_name, a.device_size, a.device_size_unit, a.device_description, a.device_nic_ip_address, a.device_nic_mac_address, a.reg_date, a.reg_user, a.update_date, a.update_user, SUBSTRING(LOWER(a.device_nic_mac_address), 1, 2) AS mac_address1, SUBSTRING(LOWER(a.device_nic_mac_address), 4, 2) AS mac_address2, SUBSTRING(LOWER(a.device_nic_mac_address), 7, 2) AS mac_address3, SUBSTRING(LOWER(a.device_nic_mac_address), 10, 2) AS mac_address4, SUBSTRING(LOWER(a.device_nic_mac_address), 13, 2) AS mac_address5, SUBSTRING(LOWER(a.device_nic_mac_address), 16, 2) AS mac_address6 FROM setting.cc_cfg_node_network_interface a) AS b WHERE b.mac_address1 = ?1 AND b.mac_address2 = ?2 AND b.mac_address3 = ?3 AND b.mac_address4 = ?4 AND b.mac_address5 = ?5 AND b.mac_address6 = ?6

named-query.name: NodeNoteInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeNoteInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.noteId

named-query.name: NodeNetstatInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeNetstatInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.protocol, a.id.localIpAddress, a.id.localPort, a.id.foreignIpAddress, a.id.foreignPort, a.id.processName, a.id.pid

named-query.name: NodeProcessInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeProcessInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.processName

named-query.name: NodePackageInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodePackageInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.packageName, a.id.packageId

named-query.name: NodeProductInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeProductInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.productName

named-query.name: NodeLicenseInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeLicenseInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.productName

named-query.name: NodeCustomInfo.findByfacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeCustomInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.settingId, a.id.settingCustomId

named-query.name: FacilityRelationEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FacilityRelationEntity a

named-query.name: FacilityRelationEntity.findParent
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FacilityRelationEntity a WHERE a.childFacilityId = :childFacilityId ORDER BY a.parentFacilityId, a.childFacilityId

named-query.name: FacilityRelationEntity.findChild
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FacilityRelationEntity a WHERE a.parentFacilityId = :parentFacilityId ORDER BY a.parentFacilityId, a.childFacilityId

named-query.name: CollectorPlatformMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorPlatformMstEntity a ORDER BY a.orderNo

named-query.name: CollectorSubPlatformMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorSubPlatformMstEntity a ORDER BY a.orderNo

named-query.name: NodeHistoryEntity.findPackageLatest
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(a.id.regDate) FROM NodeHistory a WHERE a.packageFlag = true AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.regDate <= :regDate

named-query.name: NodeProcessInfoEntity.findLatests
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeProcessInfo a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.pid ASC

named-query.name: NodeCpuHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeCpuHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.deviceIndex = :deviceIndex AND a.id.deviceType = :deviceType AND a.id.deviceName = :deviceName AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeDiskHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeDiskHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.deviceIndex = :deviceIndex AND a.id.deviceType = :deviceType AND a.id.deviceName = :deviceName AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeFilesystemHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeFilesystemHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.deviceIndex = :deviceIndex AND a.id.deviceType = :deviceType AND a.id.deviceName = :deviceName AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeVariableHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeVariableHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.nodeVariableName = :nodeVariableName AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeHostnameHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeHostnameHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.hostname = :hostname AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeMemoryHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeMemoryHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.deviceIndex = :deviceIndex AND a.id.deviceType = :deviceType AND a.id.deviceName = :deviceName AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeNetworkInterfaceHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeNetworkInterfaceHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.deviceIndex = :deviceIndex AND a.id.deviceType = :deviceType AND a.id.deviceName = :deviceName AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeOsHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeOsHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeNetstatHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeNetstatHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.protocol = :protocol AND a.id.localIpAddress = :localIpAddress AND a.id.localPort = :localPort AND a.id.foreignIpAddress = :foreignIpAddress AND a.id.foreignPort = :foreignPort AND a.id.processName = :processName AND a.id.pid = :pid AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodePackageHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodePackageHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.packageId = :packageId AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeProductHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeProductHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.productName = :productName AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeLicenseHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeLicenseHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.productName = :productName AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeCustomHistoryDetailEntity.findByRegDateTo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeCustomHistoryDetail a WHERE a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.id.settingId = :settingId AND a.id.settingCustomId = :settingCustomId AND a.regDateTo = :regDateTo

named-query.name: NodeConfigSettingInfo.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeConfigSettingInfo a

named-query.name: AutoRegisterNodeInfo.findValid
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a FROM AutoRegisterNodeInfo a WHERE a.valid='true' ORDER BY a.orderNo ASC, a.sourceNetwork ASC

named-query.name: NodeConfigSettingInfo.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeConfigSettingInfo a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.settingId

named-query.name: NodeConfigSettingInfo.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM NodeConfigSettingInfo a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.settingId
